title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 720-3.3 - Preparation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 720-3.3 - Preparation

State Regulations
(a) Tariff changes
shall be made using a format specified in the Department of Public Service's

Electronic Tariff System: Utility Preparer's Guide (See Appendix 7-H of this

Title). (b) Notations or markings
shall not be made on any schedule, supplement, or statement, except as
specifically provided for in sections
720-2.4, 720-5.1, 720-5.2, and
720-5.3
of this Part. (c) References to localities outside of the

State of New York shall include the name of the state. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
§§
720-3.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
